Title: Dead Snow
Overview: Eight medical students on a ski trip to Norway discover that Hitler's horrors live on when they come face to face with a battalion of zombie Nazi soldiers intent on devouring anyone unfortunate enough to wander into the remote mountains where they were once sent to die.
production_companies: Euforia Film, FilmCamp, Miho Film, Barentsfilm, Yellow Bastard Production, News On Request (NOR), Zwart Arbeid
Cast: Charlotte Frogner, Stig Frode Henriksen, Vegar Hoel
clean_text: dead snow eight medical student ski trip norway discover hitler horror live come face face battalion zombie nazi soldier intent devour unfortunate wander remote mountain send die ein zwei die horror comedy tommy wirkola charlotte frogner stig frode henriksen vegar hoel 2009
